GSD.product_version: versions from v5.5 to before v5.15.11
GSD.description:
btrfs: fix memory leak in __add_inode_ref()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.11 by commit 493ff661d434d6bdf02e3a21adae04d7a0b4265d, it was introduced in version v5.5 by commit d3316c8233bb05e0dd855d30aac347bb8ad76ee4. For more details please see the references link.
